title: [CLIENT] Nightmare Tryndamere End-Game Screen Image Changed to Aatrox
body:
I've played a couple games today with Tryndamere using the "Nightmare" skin. This bug only happened to me for one game, not more. I'm trying to understand if my client is bugged or anything else. That said, I have no instructions to explain how to bug occured and how to reproduce it but I can always show a proof of what I'm saying. Sorry if you cannot do anything, I still wanted to report that. <3


Proof:
https://gyazo.com/25f0f17510152449600d768709b6ccde

Gyazo is a screenshot program that was on my computer when I took the screenshot :)
Have a nice day!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a known issue on our end where sometimes, the server has issues pulling the proper data, and defaults to the first image in the catalog - which so happens to be Aatrox. D: We're looking into what's causing the server to have a bad time!
